ValidationRule.description: Estimated # of buyers is Required when Status = "Negotiation" for Vendor Accounts
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.Override_Validation ), ISCHANGED(Account_Status__c), ISPICKVAL( Account_Status__c ,"Negotiation"), ISBLANK( Estimated_of_Buyers__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide an Estimated Number of Buyers.
